website_summaries.verdict: A highly-cushioned neutral road shoe perfect for comfort seekers.
pros: The 1080's comfortable Fresh Foam midsole delivers an energetic ride
This maximally cushioned shoe gets top marks for excellent shock absorption
cons: The fit is a little narrow and some found the overall feel a bit too stiff

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy running shoe I have purchased in years!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work for AMAZON in a fulfillment center and am on my feet 10 hours a day. We're in PEAK at this time of year and these shoes have saved my life and my job. Had two knee replacements within the past year and was really concerned about my ability to return to the rigors of the job. My new knees and my new FRESH FOAMS are just what the doctor ordered for me. Thanks AMAZON and NEW BALANCE Fresh Foam. Bought 2 more pair of these!!! WOO HOO...........
customer_reviews.author: ginny b

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with problem feet.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only sneakers my wife can wear. She has neuromas and plantar fasciitis, which makes it very hard to find shoes that don't hurt her feet. These have enough padding to protect her feet, yet keep her joints moving enough to keep her feet from stiffening up. She wanted these because the color is less outrageous than some of the 1080's from the past, which could be downright gaudy.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Wren

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are very comfortable. However, I've had them only two months and they are falling apart. I paid $123.81 for these shoes and have worn them about 30 times. I thought New Balance was supposed to be a good brand. I'm very disappointed and do not recommend them. I really feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Harken

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful support. Roomy toe box!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe! Wider in the toe box, but it’s perfect for balance and support. These are my favorite shoes. This is my 7 th pair of the fresh foams 1080s. I used to wear custom orthotics even, then when I stated wearing this New Balance style my feet issues disappeared! I’ll keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: christina holthaus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 pairs of these shoes. The first pair I bought going off what others have said about New Balance. I have plantars fascitis and bad ankles and knees. I have put a lot of money into trying shoes. I can wear these all day and my feet will not hurt at the end of the day. I work on concrete floors and these are working great for my issues. Lots of shoes feel comfortable, but until you wear them all day you really dont know. These get my vote!
customer_reviews.author: Margie A Probst

customer_reviews.title: Love cushion but toe box too low
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is super! I wish I could wear those, but toe box height was not high enough. My toe nails hits, and not possible to wear. I have wide feet, I chose EE. It was too wide. The length is longer than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Get the Best

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Morton's Neruoma!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Morton's Neuroma for several years now, but I love hiking and walking and am always on the lookout for shoes that don't crowd the toe box/metatarsals. These shoes are amazing. I just did the San Diego 3-day in these, 60 miles over 3 days, and, while I certainly had blisters and other issues, my Morton's Neuroma was never a problem. I am very impressed with these shoes and am buying extra pairs for backups.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fake new balance..don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible fake new balance. Don’t buy. First night I went running it felt like there was a ball underneath the space under my toes. Way too small and my feet fell asleep. The bottoms were painted haphazardly. Getting kind of tired of the quality of Amazon lately.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: If you have weak ankles DONTbuy this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn the shoes several times r To church. I've noticed the shoes are rolling to the outside As an orthotist (someone that's makes custom braces & works withe feet) the forefoot supinate, causing ankle strain.
customer_reviews.author: Marie O.

customer_reviews.title: not as cushioning as billed to be
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something providing a lot of cushioning for high-impact exercise, and this was billed as one of the cushiest shoes available. The reviews that say this are WRONG. I am used to the Asics Gel-Nimbus series and this just isn't in that league. It's feels as flat as tons of cheaper shoes as far as this aspect goes, and while I'm sure it's a well-made shoe, it's not worth $100 to me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kahl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with great support.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for mom, she absolutely loves them! She was having a lot of foot pain because she walks a lot. After she started wearing the shoes, her pain resolved. She describes it as walking in clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and wide through the toes.
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these shoes for the past few years. They fit perfectly for me. I wear a size 6 and need width through the toes for a Bunyan. My last pair look as good as when I bought them but the support has broken down. I do a lot of walking for excercise and these are my go to shoes.
customer_reviews.author: VALERIE S DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Great support for walking
customer_reviews.text: I walk several miles daily. It can be a challenge because my gait is uneven and sneakers tend to wear out first on the outer heel but not in these sneakers. The support is excellent as is the cushioning. Walk miles without problems now.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pocker

customer_reviews.title: Messed up ordering
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This would have been my 3rd pair. When I ordered there were 2 size 9.5 available. Narrow or wide were the choices. I was sent a double wide and they were too big so I went back to order the 9.5 wide. Clicked on the 9.5 wide and added to my cart. Sure enough it came up in my cart as 9.5 double wide. Buyer beware. Tried to contact amazon concerning this glitch but no luck. Double check what is actually shown in your cart before you order.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Narrows
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a narrow 7 1⁄2 and fit fine except for narrows I still had to lace them all the way and at times it hurts my foot by the tongue. Slips in heel and not narrow enough in the heel for narrows.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Wehrkamp

customer_reviews.title: Runs WIDE
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run WIDE. I like them but my foot twists around in them because of their wide base. This also makes them look funny. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tampaslp

customer_reviews.title: Very large, bulky and not aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very large (in terms of actually size of the shoes, not fit) and bulky looking... Not aesthetically pleasing. Immediately returned without even trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: LOM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for exercising
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes for exercise classes and they are very comfortable. I have flat feet, so can't wear most shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Readmorebooks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and hold up with frequent use
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and wear well 10-12 hour days on concrete floors. My orthotics fit well inside also. Seem to last longer than others with frequent wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New balance shoes
customer_reviews.text: Second pair! Absolutely love these shoes. Bought a pair for working out and a pair for work. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: not same size fit as model originally purchased in NEW BALANCE STORE
customer_reviews.text: though size the same did not fit the same. also detailing on shoe not same. are these seconds?
customer_reviews.author: carol sisco

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts whether I would like NB shoes but these feel great. Going to order a second pair! Padding is great.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Comfort foam!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cushioned and super comfortable for walking. I broke them in my family vacation to California and I had no discomfort what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my heel issues
customer_reviews.text: Although my heel pain is gone the shoe is still bit too narrow for my foot. I'm putting up with it because I spent so much on this shoe but would recommend purchasing it in wide. I have fairly narrow feet but still have issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Feels good
customer_reviews.text: I liked how it looks. I wear it to the gym and for casual wear when I need to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Frist

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by PT
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by my PT for running, very comfortable with good cushion and support.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my feet. They hurt all the time. I also like to walk a lot these are the only sneakers I’m able to wear without having feet pain. Definitely recommend these to anyone who walks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not for me - may be for someone else.
customer_reviews.text: Just weren't comfy for me - but I have lots of issues with my feet...
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for hours
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is wonderful! I am a nurse and am on my feet 12 hours at a time walking continuously. This sneaker has saved me from so much pain at the end of a shift, as it offloads pressure on my heels. Love, love, love this sneaker!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, eased pain from plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: These shoes offer superior cushioning and support. They helped to ease the pain I have from plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: In Naturalizer I wear a 7W in these I wear 8.5 regular width. Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, very cushy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cushy sole because the pads on the bottom of my feet are so worn down. These shoes fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Collins

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I'm typically a size 6.5 but I should have ordered a 7 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Run in these shoes six days a week. They are wonderful. Log many miles before they wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best. Lots of room in the toe, super comfortable, and I love the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. These seem a bit loose on the heel and rub a bit on the t of my foot sure they will be fine after they’re broken in
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J.Pehl

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. I have a wide width, but didn’t need to order the wide ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Pitts

customer_reviews.title: v8’s are more padded than v7’s
customer_reviews.text: I have several New Balance 1080v7 shoes. I bought the1080v8 shoe and it has the same fit but it has more padding. I like my v7’s but I love my v8’s. I use them for walking and for everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Martin

customer_reviews.title: My feet love me....
customer_reviews.text: At first I was going to return them! I’m so glad I gave them a second try! They are amazing!!!!! Like walking in a cloud!
customer_reviews.author: yevonne allison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Jogging and running gym sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great for walking and jogging. This is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate all the cushion. I tried some other New Balance on in their store and they didn't have as much support or cushion as these so I upgraded and am happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Not true 2E width sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love the color scheme and fresh foam sole . The width is not consistent with other NewBalance 2E width shoes. The toe box is tight and narrow. The widest part of the shoe is sewn so stretches less. I can’t wear this shoe. Not made for 2E width feet!
customer_reviews.author: JeannineBee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and look great. They are also lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clunky and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like but a bit clunky looking. Super comfy, however.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes and these are my second pair. Super comfortable and great support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks too much!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe and the feel but it squeaks too much! Even when I’m sitting, the shoe squeaks!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Santos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and good support - have wide foot and these feel better than other shoes by far
customer_reviews.author: sandra sanders

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam 1080 V8 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: 360 degrees of premium performance technologies and incredible comfort bring this new null to life in the fresh foam 1080 V8. A redesigned, substantial and smooth midsole foam, with reconfigured flex grooves improves upon the reliable cushioning celebrated in previous models. An engineered mesh upper with a soft yet secure midfoot saddle enables the foot to flex freely yet maintain a structured, protected fit.
feature_bullets: Fresh Foam innovative midsole created from a single piece of foam that provides a plush, more natural ride
